column8:
This design admires both Herbert Hoover and fishing.
Hoover was the 31st President of the United States from 1929 to 1933. He was famous for his love of fishing and gave many quotes relating to this.
Some of these include:

- "There are only two occasions when Americans respect privacy, especially in Presidents. Those are prayer and fishing"

- "All men are equal, before Fish"

- "Fishing is much more than fish. It is the great occasion when we may return to the fine simplicity of our forefathers"

and

- "Be patient and calm - for no one can catch fish in anger" - This is my favourite quote and the one I have used in my design.

You can see more fishing related designs here .
